projects.name: SALES PREDICTION

projects.description: Created a scalable Inventory Management System for retail and warehouse environments, facilitating efficient product tracking and order management.

experiences.description: Developed a data-driven sales prediction project leveraging Python and machine learning techniques to forecast product demand based on historical data and external factors. Increased profitability by 40% by achieving reliable predictions, optimizing resource allocation, and aligning supply with demand. Enhanced sales prediction accuracy by 60% through the adoption of advanced machine learning models and real-time data integration. Explored advanced machine learning models and incorporate real-time data integration to enhance the accuracy and responsiveness of sales predictions, thereby supporting adaptive business strategies.

Designed and implemented user-friendly interfaces and interactive elements using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to enhance the user experience of company websites. Collaborated with back end developers to integrate front end designs seamlessly with databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB), ensuring efficient data retrieval and manipulation by 60%. Conducted performance optimization and ensure cross-browser compatibility to maintain website responsiveness, while also troubleshooting and resolving front end issues to uphold site functionality and user satisfaction.
